title: CXO Software
description: CXO is a purpose-built, web based, EPM reporting solution for finance teams. With out-of-the-box connectivity to all market leading EPM solutions, CXO enables users to deliver high quality digital reports and dashboard and speed up reporting cycles to meet the needs of C-level executives. It allows finance teams to tell the full story behind the numbers with built-in commentary. CXO instantly understands financial data and hierarchies with built-in EPM Smarts and puts Finance in control with easy report creation. This ensures organizations get up and running fast without relying on IT, allowing the finance team to spend more time on analysis.
